import React from 'react' import CommonSection from '../shared/CommonSection' import '../styles/tour.css' import TourCard from './../shared/TourCard' import SearchBar from './../shared/SearchBar' import NewsLetter from './../shared/NewsLetter' import { Container, Col, Row } from 'reactstrap' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const Tours = () => { const [pageCount, setPageCount] = useState(0); const [page, setPage] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const pages = Math.ceil(5/8) setPageCount(pages) }, [page]) return ( <>
{ tourData?.map((tour) => ( )) }
) } export default Tours
